snippet: On One Direction’s new album, “Take Me Home,” the group is rushing through its gestation period on the way to the magic that may await on the other side.
abstract: Jon Caramanica Contends that, with the release of their second album Take Me Home,  One Direction has nearly run its course as a boy band and speculates as to what the members plan to do next.
lead_paragraph: On One Direction’s new album, “Take Me Home,” the group is rushing through its gestation period on the way to the magic that may await on the other side.

headline.seo: One Direction Rides Boy Band Wave With ‘Take Me Home’
headline.main: Riding the Boy Band Wave While It Lasts
headline.print_headline: Riding the Boy Band Wave While It Lasts
